title: Avengers: Endgame
assumptions: User sentiment indicating a preference for different fates for Captain America (should have died), Thanos (should have lived), Thor (should have died), and Natasha Romanoff (should have lived) suggests a potential for minor long-term dissatisfaction.
The emotional impact of Tony Stark's death, approved by the user, contributed positively to the film's initial reception but is balanced by other character arc preferences.
